mapper.insert: insert into bmember (userid, passwd, username, useremail, useraddr1, useraddr2, useraddr3) values (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{username}, #{useremail}, #{useraddr1}, #{useraddr2}, #{useraddr3})
mapper.select: select rnum, userid, passwd, username, useremail, reg_date, useraccess from (select userid, passwd, username, useremail, reg_date, useraccess, row_number() over(order by reg_date) as rnum from bmember) order by reg_date desc

select rnum, userid, passwd, username, useremail, useraddr1, useraddr2, useraddr3, reg_date, up_date, useraccess from (select userid, passwd, username, useremail, useraddr1, useraddr2, useraddr3, reg_date, up_date, useraccess, row_number() over(order by reg_date) as rnum from bmember) where rnum = #{rnum} order by reg_date desc
mapper.update: update bmember set username = #{username}, useremail = #{useremail}, passwd = #{passwd}, useraddr1 = #{useraddr1}, useraddr2 = #{useraddr2}, useraddr3 = #{useraddr3}, up_date = sysdate where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bmember where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}

select userid, username, useremail, reg_date, useraccess from bmember
order by reg_date desc

choose.when: where userid like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or username like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or useremail like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or useraccess like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
